mapper.update: insert into sys_movie( movie_name, movie_length, movie_poster, movie_area, movie_introduction, release_date, movie_pictures ) values( #{movieName}, #{movieLength}, #{moviePoster}, #{movieArea}, #{movieIntroduction}, #{releaseDate}, #{moviePictures} )

update sys_movie set movie_name = #{movieName}, movie_length = #{movieLength}, movie_poster = #{moviePoster}, movie_introduction = #{movieIntroduction}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, movie_box_office = #{movieBoxOffice}, movie_pictures = #{moviePictures}, movie_area = #{movieArea} where movie_id = #{movieId}
update sys_movie set del_state = 1 where movie_id = #{movieId}
mapper.select: select distinct sm.* from sys_movie sm join sys_session ss on sm.movie_id = ss.movie_id where ss.session_date >= CURDATE() and ss.session_date < ADDDATE(curdate(),5)
select sm.* from sys_movie sm where del_state = 0 and sm.release_date <= curdate() order by sm.movie_box_office desc
select sm.* from sys_movie sm where del_state = 0 and sm.movie_area in ("中国大陆", "中国香港", "中国台湾") and sm.release_date <= curdate() order by sm.movie_box_office desc
select sm.* from sys_movie sm where del_state = 0 and sm.movie_area not in ("中国大陆", "中国香港", "中国台湾") and sm.release_date <= curdate() order by sm.movie_box_office desc
